While windows if offered free please note that attempting to install Windows on limited RAM may cause your VPS to blue screen, so is not suitable for anything under 768MB for 2008 Standard edition

HUGE selection of Linux ISO's and auto install templates plus option to upload custom ISO’s and Custom Plans, windows 2012 now available.

UK Based Servers – Payments: PayPal | - VAT @ 20% applies to EU Customers only.

Thank you, NECS.
